title: MinorPerformanceTransactionInbound
description: Subcomponent of the performanceLogRecord; Represents the inner inbound transaction of the request

downstreamCallType.description: placeholder value to indicate either: InvokeAdapter or InvokeService

transactionStatus.description: The current state of the transaction lifecycle.  Must be one of the following:(INITIATED, COMPLETE, ERROR, WARN)

adapterDataSourceType.description: Abbreviated name of the Adapter Data Source Type
